name: yellowpages-scraper
description: Comprehensive Yellowpages.com business scraper with data mining and visualization capabilities

scripts.quick-analysis: node -e "const { quickAnalysis } = require('./dataMiningRunner'); const fs = require('fs'); const csvFiles = fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f => f.endsWith('.csv')); if(csvFiles.length > 0) quickAnalysis(csvFiles[0]); else console.log('No CSV files found');"
scripts.full-pipeline: node -e "const { runDataMiningPipeline } = require('./dataMiningRunner'); const fs = require('fs'); const csvFiles = fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f => f.endsWith('.csv')); if(csvFiles.length > 0) runDataMiningPipeline(csvFiles[0]); else console.log('No CSV files found');"

author: Your Name
